XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <!-- ==================================== КУРСЫ ==================================== -->
<!-- Получить все курсы, коротко --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/json/allCoursesShortInfo/:isInUse" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetCoursesShortInfo"/>
<!-- ==================================== ЗАЯВКИ ==================================== -->
<!-- Создать заявку --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/createOrder" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:CreateOrder"/>
<!-- Создать заявку для одного слушателя --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/createOrderNewStudent" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:CreateOrderNewStudent"/>
<!-- Получить информацию о заявке по коду доступа --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/json/approvedOrderInfo/:code" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetApprovedOrderInfo"/>
<!-- Завершить редактирование заявки --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/finishEditingOrder" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:FinishEditingOrder"/>
<!-- ==================================== КОМПАНИИ ==================================== -->
<!-- Получить все компании, коротко --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/json/allCompaniesShortInfo" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetCompaniesShortInfo"/>
<!-- Получить все компании, коротко для конкретного обучения --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/json/allCompaniesShortInfo/training/:id" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetCompaniesShortInfoForTraining"/>
<!-- Сохранить данные компании из заявки, указав код доступа --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/saveCompany" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:SaveCompany"/>
<!-- ==================================== ПЕРСОНЫ ==================================== -->
<!-- Получить студентов заявки по коду доступа --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/approvedOrderStudents" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetApprovedOrderStudents"/>
<!-- Создать слушателя для заявки. При совпадении email связать слушателя и заявку --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/saveOrderStudent" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:SaveOrderStudent"/>
<!-- Удалить слушателя из заявки и из базы(если удаление возможно) --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/deleteOrderStudent" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:DeleteOrderStudent"/>
<!-- Получить слушателя заявки по коду доступа --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/getOrderStudent" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetOrderStudent"/>
<!-- ==================================== ДРУГОЕ ==================================== -->
<!-- Получить обучение, коротко --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/json/training/:id" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetTraining"/>
<!-- --> <Route Method="POST" Url="/json/trainingStudents" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetTrainingStudents"/>
<!-- Получить все города, поиск совпадения --> <Route Method="GET" Url="/json/citiesStartsWith/:startsWith" Call="Stc.Web.JsonUser:GetCitiesStartsWith"/>
<!-- Отчет, слушатели обучения--> <Route Method="GET" Url="/text/:lang/students/:trainingAccessCode" Call="Stc.Web.Report:Students"/>
</Routes>

Method.name: DispatchRequest
Method.Description: Dispatch a REST request according to URL and Method
Method.Implementation:
set lang = $CASE(%request.CgiEnvs("HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE"), "en":"en", :"ru") do ##class(%MessageDictionary).SetSessionLanguage(lang) set %session.Language = lang //--- #dim tSC As %Status = $$$OK #dim e As %Exception.AbstractException
#dim tMatcher As %Regex.Matcher
#dim tArgs,tClass,tMatchUrl,tMapEntry,tRegEx,tTarget,tAccess As %String #dim tI,tIndex As %Integer #dim tResourceMatched As %Boolean #dim tMethodMatched As %Boolean
Try { #; Check that the effective user ( could be unknown user ) can access this resource Set tAccess=$SYSTEM.Security.Check($Piece($zu(90,21,$namespace),"^",4)) If tAccess'["READ,WRITE" { #; Don't want the session token Set %response.OutputSessionToken=0
#; Set the Http Status Set %response.Status="401 Unauthorized"
#; Write out the header Do %response.WriteHTTPHeader()
#; Done Quit }
Set (tResourceMatched,tMethodMatched)=0
#; Walk the dispatch map in collation order of defintion For tIndex=1:1 {
#; Get the next map entry Set tMapEntry=..DispatchMap(tIndex) If tMapEntry="" Quit
#; Pick out the RegEx Set tRegEx=$List(tMapEntry,1)
#; Create a matcher Set tMatcher=##class(%Regex.Matcher).%New(tRegEx)
#; Extract the match url from the application name Set tMatchUrl="/"_$Extract(pUrl,$Length(%request.Application)+1,*)
#; Test each regular expression in turn, extracting the arguments, #; dispatching to the named method If tMatcher.Match(tMatchUrl) {
#; We have matched the resource Set tResourceMatched=1
#; Now check method name If pMethod'=$List(tMapEntry,2) Continue
Set tTarget=$List(tMapEntry,3)
#; We have matched a method Set tMethodMatched=1
#; Got a match, marshall the arguments If tMatcher.GroupCount { For tI=1:1:tMatcher.GroupCount Set tArgs(tI)=tMatcher.Group(tI) Set tArgs=tI } else { Set tArgs=0 }
#; Check for optional ClassName prefix Set tClass=$classname() If tTarget[":" Set tClass=$Piece(tTarget,":"),tTarget=$Piece(tTarget,":",2)
#; Dispatch Set tSC=$zobjclassmethod(tClass,tTarget,tArgs...) If $$$ISERR(tSC) Do ..Http500(##class(%Exception.StatusException).CreateFromStatus(tSC))
#; Don't want multiple matches Quit } }
#; Didn't have a match for the resource, report not found If tResourceMatched=0 Set tSC=..Http404() Quit
#; Had a match for resource but method not matched If tMethodMatched=0 Set tSC=..Http405() Quit
} Catch (e) {
#; Issue a '500' Do ..Http500(e) }
If ..#UseSession=0 Set %session.EndSession=1
Quit tSC
